name: Speed Racing 3D
description:
With Speed Racing 3D experience a racing with excellent controls!
Accelerate and go for the longest distance without crashing to the cars in the traffic.
Remember, you would get more points and coins if you overtake the other cars more closely!
Get the best car with the coins you collect in the game and reach to the top in the score charts!
Key Features:
* Brilliant 3D graphics!
* Difficulty curve which leads to a continuous game tempo!
* Beautiful themes changing constantly!
* Chance to challenge international gamers
* Power ups to help you to get the highest score
publishers: Mobil Interaktif Bilisim Hizmetleri Anonim Sirketi
